text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1944 Final was the 42nd final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Montjuïc in Barcelona, on 25 June 1944, being won by Club Atlético de Bilbao, who beat Valencia CF 2-0. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Club Atlético de Bilbao: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Raimundo Lezama |- |DF ||2|| Salvador Arqueta |- |DF ||3|| Isaac Oceja (c) |- |MF ||4|| Francisco Celaya |- |MF ||5|| Roberto Bertol |- |MF ||6|| Nando |- |FW ||7|| Rafael Iriondo |- |FW ||8|| José Luis Panizo |- |FW ||9|| Telmo Zarra |- |FW||10|| Rafael Escudero |- |FW||11|| Agustín Gaínza |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Juan Urquizu |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Valencia CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Ignacio Eizaguirre |- |DF ||2|| Álvaro |- |DF ||3|| Juan Ramón (c) |- |MF ||4|| Higinio Ortúzar |- |MF ||5|| Carlos Iturraspe |- |MF ||6|| Simón Lecue |- |FW ||7|| Epi |- |FW ||8|| Vicente Hernández |- |FW ||9|| Mundo |- |FW||10|| Silvestre Igoa |- |FW||11|| Vicente Asensi |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Eduardo Cubells |- |} |} ==References== 1944 Copa Category:Athletic Bilbao matches Category:Valencia CF matches
title: 1944 Copa del Generalísimo Final
